publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6758 Dr Richard Simpson: Scotland Becomes European Touch Rugby Champion—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish team for becoming the 2010 European Touch Champion in the Open Men’s Division; considers that there is increasing interest in this form of rugby from men and women of all ages; welcomes the support for touch rugby from the Scottish Rugby Union; looks forward to the Touch World Cup in Edinburgh in May 2011, and hopes that this event will provide the stimulus to further growth in this activity.
S3M-6758Scotland Becomes European Touch Rugby Champion (lodged on 26 July 2010) Gil Paterson*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-6758 Scotland Becomes European Touch Rugby Champion (lodged on 26 July 2010) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-6758 Scotland Becomes European Touch Rugby Champion (lodged on 26 July 2010) Helen Eadie*
